dcterms:creator: J. Almazán
A. Gordo
A. Fornés
E. Valveny
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 1 million handwritten word images created to address the lack of training data for handwritten word recognition. The dataset is formed from 750 publicly available handwritten fonts and a subset of a popular dictionary.
dcterms:title: HW-SYNTH

dcterms:creator: U. Marti
H. Bunke
dcterms:description: The IAM database is an English sentence database designed for offline handwriting recognition, containing handwritten text samples.
dcterms:title: IAM

dcterms:creator: A. Fischer
A. Keller
V. Frinken
H. Bunke
dcterms:description: The George Washington dataset consists of handwritten documents used for lexicon-free handwritten word spotting, allowing for the recognition of words without a predefined lexicon.
dcterms:title: GW (George Washington)

dcterms:creator: P. D. Clough
M. Stevenson
dcterms:description: The DocSim dataset contains plagiarized short answers created by participants in a controlled setting, designed for evaluating plagiarism detection methods.
dcterms:title: DocSim

dcterms:description: The HW-1K dataset is collected from real assignments of students, containing nearly 1K handwritten pages with varied content and layout.
dcterms:title: HW-1K
